name: NaijaForexRates
0:
”Alexa, open Naija Forex Rates”
”how much is dollar”
”what is euro rate”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: naija forex rates
des:
Discover a new way to get the current exchange rates (buy/sell) for Naira to foreign currency from the parallel market in Nigeria. Rather than opening up a browser tab or launching an app, you can get the current rates using simple voice commands.

To get started, enable the skill and simply say, "Alexa, open Naija Forex rates." Once this skill is opened, try out these voice commands:

• Ask "How much is dollar today?" to get the current exchange rate for Naira - Dollar.
• Ask "What is euro rate?" to get the current exchange rate for Naira - Euro.
• Say "Pound" to get the current exchange rate for Naira - Pounds.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
